name: Christmas Workshop (ADHowww)
description:
This is a casual game where your are a pair of Christmas Elves catching the parts to build gifts, increasing your score as you assemble them. Gifts needing more parts give you more points, but are more difficult to fully assemble within the time limit.   

Developed for Weekly Game Jam #178, theme- Birthday Gifts (although I just took the gift part and made it Christmas themed).

The game utilises sounds from Freesound.org and fonts from Dafont.com (mentioned in credits menu).
